info.name: Konexi Backend Test API Documentation
info.description:
This API provides a backend for your social media platform, allowing users to create posts, follow other users, like and comment on posts, and search for posts using keywords, and get user feeds based on their following. The API is designed to be secure, scalable, and user-friendly.

## Endpoints

This API is divided into two main components:

1. User Management
    
2. Post Management
    

## Authentication

User authentication is handled using JWT (JSON Web Tokens). To access protected routes and perform actions on behalf of a user, you must include a valid JWT token in the Authorization header of your requests.

## Response Format

The format is based on [JSend](https://github.com/omniti-labs/jsend)

| Status | Description | Returned Keys |
| --- | --- | --- |
| success | All went well, and (usually) some data was returned. | status, data |
| fail | There was a problem with the data submitted, or some pre-condition of the API call wasn't satisfied | status, data |
| error | An error occurred in processing the request, i.e. an exception was thrown | status, message |

item.name: Users

response.name: Fail

item.description: This endpoint handles user registration and profile management. Users can create accounts, delete accounts, and update their profile information securely. User can also follow and unfollow other users.

item.name: Posts

query.description: optional set truthy value to get user feeds
optional string keyword to search posts caption

item.description: This component allows users to create, edit, and delete posts. Users can also like and comment on posts, see posts from users they follow, and search post caption by keyword.
